title: Using Machine Learning to Optimize Impact of Election Donations
description: Demonstrating the impact of campaign donations on the House of Representatives.

title: Parallelizing Primes
description: Exploring faster ways to find prime numbers computationally through parallel computing optimization.
content: The aim of this project is to explore the computation of prime numbers, a fundamental topic in mathematics that has been of great interest to mathematicians throughout history. The motivation behind this research is to discover a f...
